There are so many different religious teaching people come to my home and tried to convince me, but whoever comes to my doorstep I do not turn myself as I would like to practice what I believe.  
I think there is no point to slapping people who come to convert you to a different religion because it is impossible to stop, it is better to teach true Budisum to the followers and make there believe durable. Then whoever comes to convert them, they won't be changed.
